item.title: Speed up docker builds with distcc, ccache and kubernetes
item.description: For a recent project I had to write my own Orthanc plugin. To build this plugin I needed to build Orthanc from source. The official docker-images are assembled based on pre-built binaries. So I could not use them. Orthanc Dockerfile The first step is create a Dockerfile that compiles Orthanc from source. Looking through the compilation instructions and inspired by the official docker images I have assembled the following Dockerfile:
